original: Arlid, Sven Al’f Idor, kyrkolberde, Ljungby, f. 21/7/04 i Gbg. G. 31 m. Greta Gauffin. Barn: Sven f. 32, Margareta 35, Elisabeth 37, Sten 42. — Stud :ex. v. Fjedd-steidtiska sk. i Upps. 26, teoi. fi’1. ex. i Lund 27, teol. kand. samt prakt. teol. prov 30, prästvigd f. Växjö stift s. å. Tjg. som e. o. prästman i Skirö, Nye, Uråsa o. Almunds-ryd, kommin. li Markaryd 31, tiliiträdde icke, domikyrko’sys’sl’oman i Växjö 31, kyrkoadj. i Växjö 33, tjg. isom tf. pastor o. förste ilär. v. Växjö centralfäng. samt som pred. v. Växjö stads vårdhem o. Kronob. läns sanat. Lugnet, kyrkoh. i Ljungby sed. 44. Insp. f. samreal-sk. där sed. 45. Skr.: predikn. o. art. i olika kyrkl. publ. samt i ortspressen.
translated: Arlid, Sven Al'f Idor, church pastor, Ljungby, born on July 21, 1904 in Gothenburg. Married in 1931 to Greta Gauffin. Children: Sven born in 1932, Margareta in 1935, Elisabeth in 1937, and Sten in 1942. He studied theology and graduated from Fjedd-Steidtiska School in Uppsala in 1926, received a theology degree from Lund University in 1927, and passed the practical theology examination in 1930. He was ordained as a priest in the Växjö Diocese the same year. He worked as a substitute priest in Skirö, Nye, Uråsa, and Almundsryd, and as a curate in Markaryd in 1931. He did not take office and instead became a cathedral chaplain in Växjö in 1931, a church aide in Växjö in 1933, acted as a temporary pastor and first teacher at Växjö Central Prison, and served as a preacher at the Växjö City Care Facility and the Kronob. County Mental Hospital called Lugnet. He became the church pastor at Ljungby since 1944, and the inspector for the community property school there since 1945. He has written sermons and articles in various church publications as well as in local press.

hasOccupation.name: Inspector for the Community Property School
